TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/SmallCaptionSizingTemplate extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a that represents the sizing template of the title bar of a small window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCaptionSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property of the VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCaptionSizingTemplate class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the sizing template of the title bar of a small window, such as a tool window.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCaptionSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallCaptionSizingTemplate1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#429](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/1d5c6c7f-233b-492c-8e54-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#429](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/1d5c6c7f-233b-492c-8e54-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the sizing template of the title bar of a small window.
Docs.value: A that represents the sizing template of the title bar of a small window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallCaptionSizingTemplate1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#429](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/4b1bf11c-a0bf-4868-b60b-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#429](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/4b1bf11c-a0bf-4868-b60b-_1.vb)]
